newsTitle: Tones and I has been added to the lineup
newsContent:
I bet you are on knees,right?
Yeah, the most viral female singer around the world this year Tones and I IS C O M I N G.
(S I N C E S O C I A L D I S T A N C E I S S O I M P O R T A N T N O W A D A Y S)

newsTitle: Here is the shuttle bus schedule
newsContent:
ONE one-way ticket costs 4 dollors.
ONE round-trip ticket costs 8 dollors.(Yeah, it isn't cheaper!)
Please notice that the shuttle bus on Monday is not scheduled.
There is only one shuttle bus drive back and forth on Mondy.
It's getting hot in here, so take off all your clothes...or stay hydrated.
